uk.co.greedygull

Class Skills

  • Object
    • Skills

  • public class Skills
extends Object
    The Skills class holds all information regarding player stats and high scores. These are retrieved from the persistent Preferences declared in Basicgame. Stats and high scores are all private and only accessed through their respective getter/setter
    Author:
    Matej
